author: dug
msg: Added a ServiceHandler so that we have some place to stick

author: dug
msg: Add support for mutliple children elements of the SOAPBody element.
This is a really cool feature, with this we'll be able to do multiple
RPC calls within one SOAPBody.  Run samples.stock.GetQuote IBM CSCO
to see.  Yes - it's possible to implement this by assuming that the
service will accept multiple symbols in the arg, but let's assume
that it doesn't - it only takes one symbol - using multiple body
elements we can save ourselves the overhead of multiple network calls.

author: jmsnell
msg: Basic prototype of Message API Reader/Writer architecture.
Not quite 100%, but on it's way.  This will give you a basic idea.
